rule.name: AS_IO_UI_HomePageActions_v1_default
rule.definition:
/*
DESCRIPTION A list of record actions that are displayed in the top right of the Connected Onboarding home page.
DEFAULT BEHAVIOR Displays the Create New Onboarding record action.
Customization Steps: Add, remove, and rearrange record list actions in this rule. These can be OOTB actions or new custom actions. Visibility/group security of existing actions can be configured here via conditional logic using loggedInUser() or other contextual functions. Visibility/group security of new custom actions should be configured in Record→ actions→ visibility or in the process security
NOTE: We assume these actions will NOT modify ref data, and these queries are not refreshed after record action, but all other data on the home page is refreshed after record action. Actions modifying refData should be restricted to the Connected FS Settings site. If these actions modify ref data, the page will need to be refreshed for the changes to take effect.
PARAMETERS: N/A
Return/Output: Expected Return Type: List of a!recordActionItem(). Output Usage: Used in displaying actions on Connected Onboarding home page.
*/
{ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordActionItem"( action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:11785fba-fdff-40a6-801c-4a34bb011a4e/04a8d840-98f6-431d-a20e-f988e3333012" ) }
